Documentation
Loading...
Searching...
No Matches
CFEM_DG_EulerSolver.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1/*!
2 * \file CFEM_DG_EulerSolver.cpp
3 * \brief Main subroutines for solving finite element Euler flow problems
4 * \author J. Alonso, E. van der Weide, T. Economon
5 * \version 8.0.1 "Harrier"
6 *
7 * SU2 Project Website: https://su2code.github.io
8 *
9 * The SU2 Project is maintained by the SU2 Foundation
10 * (http://su2foundation.org)
11 *
12 * Copyright 2012-2024, SU2 Contributors (cf. AUTHORS.md)
13 *
14 * SU2 is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
15 * modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public
16 * License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either
17 * version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
18 *
19 * SU2 is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
20 * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
21 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU
22 * Lesser General Public License for more details.
23 *
24 * You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public
25 * License along with SU2. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
26 */
27
28
29#include "../../include/solvers/CFEM_DG_EulerSolver.hpp"
30#include "../../../Common/include/toolboxes/printing_toolbox.hpp"
31#include "../../include/fluid/CIdealGas.hpp"
32#include "../../include/fluid/CVanDerWaalsGas.hpp"
33#include "../../include/fluid/CPengRobinson.hpp"
34#include "../../include/fluid/CCoolProp.hpp"
35#include "../../include/fluid/CDataDrivenFluid.hpp"
36
37enum {
38SIZE_ARR_NORM = 8
39};
40
41CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::CFEM_DG_EulerSolver() : CSolver() {
42
43 /*--- Basic array initialization ---*/
44
45 FluidModel = nullptr;
46
47 CD_Inv = nullptr; CL_Inv = nullptr; CSF_Inv = nullptr; CEff_Inv = nullptr;
48 CMx_Inv = nullptr; CMy_Inv = nullptr; CMz_Inv = nullptr;
49 CFx_Inv = nullptr; CFy_Inv = nullptr; CFz_Inv = nullptr;
50
51 /*--- Surface-based array initialization ---*/
52 Surface_CL_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CD_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CSF_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CEff_Inv = nullptr;
53 Surface_CFx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFz_Inv = nullptr;
54 Surface_CMx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMz_Inv = nullptr;
55
56 Surface_CL = nullptr; Surface_CD = nullptr; Surface_CSF = nullptr; Surface_CEff = nullptr;
57 Surface_CFx = nullptr; Surface_CFy = nullptr; Surface_CFz = nullptr;
58 Surface_CMx = nullptr; Surface_CMy = nullptr; Surface_CMz = nullptr;
59
60 /*--- Initialization of the boolean symmetrizingTermsPresent. ---*/
61 symmetrizingTermsPresent = true;
62
63 /*--- Initialize the variables for the monitoring data to avoid
64 possible valgrind warnings. ---*/
65 Total_CL = Total_CD = Total_CSF = 0.0;
66 Total_CFx = Total_CFy = Total_CFz = 0.0;
67 Total_CMx = Total_CMy = Total_CMz = 0.0;
68 Total_CEff = 0.0;
69
70 /*--- Initialize the pointer for performing the BLAS functionalities. ---*/
71 blasFunctions = nullptr;
72
73}
74
75CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::CFEM_DG_EulerSolver(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_nDim, unsigned short iMesh) : CSolver() {
76
77 /*--- Basic array initialization ---*/
78
79 FluidModel = nullptr;
80
81 CD_Inv = nullptr; CL_Inv = nullptr; CSF_Inv = nullptr; CEff_Inv = nullptr;
82 CMx_Inv = nullptr; CMy_Inv = nullptr; CMz_Inv = nullptr;
83 CFx_Inv = nullptr; CFy_Inv = nullptr; CFz_Inv = nullptr;
84
85 /*--- Surface-based array initialization ---*/
86 Surface_CL_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CD_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CSF_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CEff_Inv = nullptr;
87 Surface_CFx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFz_Inv = nullptr;
88 Surface_CMx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMz_Inv = nullptr;
89
90 Surface_CL = nullptr; Surface_CD = nullptr; Surface_CSF = nullptr; Surface_CEff = nullptr;
91 Surface_CFx = nullptr; Surface_CFy = nullptr; Surface_CFz = nullptr;
92 Surface_CMx = nullptr; Surface_CMy = nullptr; Surface_CMz = nullptr;
93
94 /*--- Store the multigrid level. ---*/
95 MGLevel = iMesh;
96
97 /*--- Initialization of the boolean symmetrizingTermsPresent. ---*/
98 symmetrizingTermsPresent = true;
99
100 /*--- Dummy solver constructor that calls the SetNondim. routine in
101 order to load the flow non-dim. information into the config class.
102 This is needed to complete a partitioning for time-accurate local
103 time stepping that depends on the flow state. ---*/
104 nDim = val_nDim;
105 Gamma = config->GetGamma();
106 Gamma_Minus_One = Gamma - 1.0;
107 SetNondimensionalization(config, iMesh, false);
108
109 /*--- Initialize the variables for the monitoring data to avoid
110 possible valgrind warnings. ---*/
111 Total_CL = Total_CD = Total_CSF = 0.0;
112 Total_CFx = Total_CFy = Total_CFz = 0.0;
113 Total_CMx = Total_CMy = Total_CMz = 0.0;
114 Total_CEff = 0.0;
115
116 /*--- Initialize the pointer for performing the BLAS functionalities. ---*/
117 blasFunctions = nullptr;
118
119}
120
121CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::CFEM_DG_EulerSolver(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) : CSolver() {
122
123 /*--- Array initialization ---*/
124 FluidModel = nullptr;
125
126 CD_Inv = nullptr; CL_Inv = nullptr; CSF_Inv = nullptr; CEff_Inv = nullptr;
127 CMx_Inv = nullptr; CMy_Inv = nullptr; CMz_Inv = nullptr;
128 CFx_Inv = nullptr; CFy_Inv = nullptr; CFz_Inv = nullptr;
129
130 Surface_CL_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CD_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CSF_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CEff_Inv = nullptr;
131 Surface_CFx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFz_Inv = nullptr;
132 Surface_CMx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMz_Inv = nullptr;
133
134 Surface_CL = nullptr; Surface_CD = nullptr; Surface_CSF = nullptr; Surface_CEff = nullptr;
135 Surface_CFx = nullptr; Surface_CFy = nullptr; Surface_CFz = nullptr;
136 Surface_CMx = nullptr; Surface_CMy = nullptr; Surface_CMz = nullptr;
137
138 /*--- Store the multigrid level. ---*/
139 MGLevel = iMesh;
140
141 /*--- Allocate the memory for blasFunctions. ---*/
142 blasFunctions = new CBlasStructure;
143
144 /*--- Set the gamma value ---*/
145 Gamma = config->GetGamma();
146 Gamma_Minus_One = Gamma - 1.0;
147
148 /*--- Define geometry constants in the solver structure. ---*/
149 nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
150 nMarker = config->GetnMarker_All();
151
152 const bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == ENUM_REGIME::COMPRESSIBLE);
153
154 if( compressible ) nVar = nDim + 2;
155 else nVar = nDim + 1;
156
157 /*--- Create an object of the class CMeshFEM_DG and retrieve the necessary
158 geometrical information for the FEM DG solver. ---*/
159 auto *DGGeometry = dynamic_cast<CMeshFEM_DG *>(geometry);
160
161 nVolElemTot = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemTot();
162 nVolElemOwned = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemOwned();
163 volElem = DGGeometry->GetVolElem();
164
165 nVolElemOwnedPerTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemOwnedPerTimeLevel();
166 nVolElemInternalPerTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemInternalPerTimeLevel();
167 nVolElemHaloPerTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemHaloPerTimeLevel();
168
169 ownedElemAdjLowTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetOwnedElemAdjLowTimeLevel();
170 haloElemAdjLowTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetHaloElemAdjLowTimeLevel();
171
172 nMeshPoints = DGGeometry->GetNMeshPoints();
173 meshPoints = DGGeometry->GetMeshPoints();
174
175 nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem = DGGeometry->GetNMatchingFacesWithHaloElem();
176 nMatchingInternalFacesLocalElem = DGGeometry->GetNMatchingFacesInternal();
177 matchingInternalFaces = DGGeometry->GetMatchingFaces();
178
179 boundaries = DGGeometry->GetBoundaries();
180
181 nStandardBoundaryFacesSol = DGGeometry->GetNStandardBoundaryFacesSol();
182 nStandardElementsSol = DGGeometry->GetNStandardElementsSol();
183 nStandardMatchingFacesSol = DGGeometry->GetNStandardMatchingFacesSol();
184
185 standardBoundaryFacesSol = DGGeometry->GetStandardBoundaryFacesSol();
186 standardElementsSol = DGGeometry->GetStandardElementsSol();
187 standardMatchingFacesSol = DGGeometry->GetStandardMatchingFacesSol();
188
189 timeCoefADER_DG = DGGeometry->GetTimeCoefADER_DG();
190 timeInterpolDOFToIntegrationADER_DG = DGGeometry->GetTimeInterpolDOFToIntegrationADER_DG();
191 timeInterpolAdjDOFToIntegrationADER_DG = DGGeometry->GetTimeInterpolAdjDOFToIntegrationADER_DG();
192
193 /*--- Determine the maximum number of integration points used. Usually this
194 is for the volume integral, but to avoid problems the faces are also
195 taken into account. ---*/
196 unsigned short nIntegrationMax = 0;
197 for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardBoundaryFacesSol; ++i) {
198 const unsigned short nInt = standardBoundaryFacesSol[i].GetNIntegration();
199 nIntegrationMax = max(nIntegrationMax, nInt);
200 }
201
202 for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardElementsSol; ++i) {
203 const unsigned short nInt = standardElementsSol[i].GetNIntegration();
204 nIntegrationMax = max(nIntegrationMax, nInt);
205 }
206
207 for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardMatchingFacesSol; ++i) {
208 const unsigned short nInt = standardMatchingFacesSol[i].GetNIntegration();
209 nIntegrationMax = max(nIntegrationMax, nInt);
210 }
211
212 /*--- Determine the maximum number of DOFs used. This is for the volume elements.
213 Note that also the element adjacent to side 1 of the matching faces must
214 be taken into account, because this could be an external element. */
215 unsigned short nDOFsMax = 0;
216 for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardElementsSol; ++i) {
217 const unsigned short nDOFs = standardElementsSol[i].GetNDOFs();
218 nDOFsMax = max(nDOFsMax, nDOFs);
219 }
220
221 for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardMatchingFacesSol; ++i) {
222 const unsigned short nDOFs = standardMatchingFacesSol[i].GetNDOFsElemSide1();
223 nDOFsMax = max(nDOFsMax, nDOFs);
224 }
225
226 /*--- Determine the size of the work array. ---*/
227 const unsigned short nPadGemm = config->GetSizeMatMulPadding();
228 if( config->GetViscous() ) {
229
230 /* Viscous simulation. */
231 unsigned int sizeFluxes = nIntegrationMax*nDim;
232 sizeFluxes = nPadGemm*max(sizeFluxes, (unsigned int) nDOFsMax);
233
234 const unsigned int sizeGradSolInt = nIntegrationMax*nDim*max(nPadGemm,nDOFsMax);
235
236 sizeWorkArray = nIntegrationMax*(4 + 3*nPadGemm) + sizeFluxes + sizeGradSolInt
237 + max(nIntegrationMax,nDOFsMax)*nPadGemm + nPadGemm*nDOFsMax;
238 }
239 else {
240
241 /* Inviscid simulation. */
242 unsigned int sizeVol = nPadGemm*nIntegrationMax*(nDim+2) + nPadGemm*nDOFsMax;
243 unsigned int sizeSur = nPadGemm*(2*nIntegrationMax + max(nIntegrationMax,nDOFsMax));
244
245 sizeWorkArray = max(sizeVol, sizeSur);
246 }
247
248 if(config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == ADER_DG) {
249
250 /*--- ADER-DG scheme. Determine the size needed for the predictor step
251 and make sure that sizeWorkArray is big enough. This size depends
252 whether an aliased or a non-aliased predictor step is used. Note
253 that the size estimates are for viscous computations. ---*/
254 const unsigned short nTimeDOFs = config->GetnTimeDOFsADER_DG();
255
256 unsigned int sizePredictorADER = 4*nPadGemm*nDOFsMax*nTimeDOFs
257 + nPadGemm*nDOFsMax;
258
259 if(config->GetKind_ADER_Predictor() == ADER_ALIASED_PREDICTOR)
260 sizePredictorADER += nDim*nPadGemm*nDOFsMax + nDim*nDim*nPadGemm*nIntegrationMax;
261 else
262 sizePredictorADER += (nDim+1)*nPadGemm*max(nIntegrationMax, nDOFsMax)
263 + nDim*nDim*nPadGemm*max(nIntegrationMax,nDOFsMax);
264
265 sizeWorkArray = max(sizeWorkArray, sizePredictorADER);
266 }
267
268 /*--- Perform the non-dimensionalization for the flow equations using the
269 specified reference values. ---*/
270 SetNondimensionalization(config, iMesh, true);
271
272 /*--- Check if we are executing a verification case. If so, the
273 VerificationSolution object will be instantiated for a particular
274 option from the available library of verification solutions. Note
275 that this is done after SetNondim(), as problem-specific initial
276 parameters are needed by the solution constructors. ---*/
277
278 SetVerificationSolution(nDim, nVar, config);
279
280 /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the residual ---*/
281
282 Residual_RMS.resize(nVar,1.e-35);
283 Residual_Max.resize(nVar,1.e-35);
284 Point_Max.resize(nVar,0);
285 Point_Max_Coord.resize(nVar,nDim) = su2double(0.0);
286
287 /*--- Non-dimensional coefficients ---*/
288 CD_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
289 CL_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
290 CSF_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
291 CMx_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
292 CMy_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
293 CMz_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
294 CEff_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
295 CFx_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
296 CFy_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
297 CFz_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
298
299 Surface_CL_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
300 Surface_CD_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
301 Surface_CSF_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
302 Surface_CEff_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
303 Surface_CFx_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
304 Surface_CFy_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
305 Surface_CFz_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
306 Surface_CMx_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
307 Surface_CMy_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
308 Surface_CMz_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
309 Surface_CL = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
310 Surface_CD = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
311 Surface_CSF = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
312 Surface_CEff = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
313 Surface_CFx = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
314 Surface_CFy = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
315 Surface_CFz = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
316 Surface_CMx = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
317 Surface_CMy = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
318 Surface_CMz = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
319
320 /*--- Init total coefficients ---*/
321 Total_CD = 0.0; Total_CL = 0.0; Total_CSF = 0.0;
322 Total_CMx = 0.0; Total_CMy = 0.0; Total_CMz = 0.0;
323 Total_CFx = 0.0; Total_CFy = 0.0; Total_CFz = 0.0;
324 Total_CEff = 0.0;
325
326 /*--- Read farfield conditions ---*/
327 Density_Inf = config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
328 Pressure_Inf = config->GetPressure_FreeStreamND();
329 Velocity_Inf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
330 Energy_Inf = config->GetEnergy_FreeStreamND();
331 Temperature_Inf = config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND();
332 Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
333
334 /*--- Set the conservative variables of the free-stream. ---*/
335 ConsVarFreeStream.resize(nVar);
336 if( compressible ) {
337 ConsVarFreeStream[0] = Density_Inf;
338 for(unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
339 ConsVarFreeStream[iDim+1] = Density_Inf*Velocity_Inf[iDim];
340 ConsVarFreeStream[nVar-1] = Density_Inf*Energy_Inf;
341 }
342 else {
343 ConsVarFreeStream[0] = Pressure_Inf;
344 for(unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
345 ConsVarFreeStream[iDim+1] = Density_Inf*Velocity_Inf[iDim];
346 }
347
348 /*--- Determine the total number of DOFs stored on this rank and allocate the memory
349 to store the conservative variables. ---*/
350 nDOFsLocOwned = 0;
351 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nVolElemOwned; ++i) nDOFsLocOwned += volElem[i].nDOFsSol;
352
353 nDOFsLocTot = nDOFsLocOwned;
354 for(unsigned long i=nVolElemOwned; i<nVolElemTot; ++i) nDOFsLocTot += volElem[i].nDOFsSol;
355
356 VecSolDOFs.resize(nVar*nDOFsLocOwned);
357
358 /*--- Allocate the memory for the working vectors for the solution variables
359 for all the time levels used. ---*/
360 const unsigned short nTimeLevels = config->GetnLevels_TimeAccurateLTS();
361 VecWorkSolDOFs.resize(nTimeLevels);
362
363 vector<unsigned long> nDOFsTimeLevels(nTimeLevels, 0);
364 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nVolElemTot; ++i) {
365 nDOFsTimeLevels[volElem[i].timeLevel] += volElem[i].nDOFsSol;
366 if(volElem[i].offsetDOFsSolPrevTimeLevel != ULONG_MAX)
367 nDOFsTimeLevels[volElem[i].timeLevel-1] += volElem[i].nDOFsSol;
368 }
369
370 for(unsigned short i=0; i<nTimeLevels; ++i)
371 VecWorkSolDOFs[i].resize(nVar*nDOFsTimeLevels[i]);
372
373 /*--- Check for the ADER-DG time integration scheme and allocate the memory
374 for the additional vectors. ---*/
375 if(config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == ADER_DG) {
376
377 const unsigned short nTimeDOFs = config->GetnTimeDOFsADER_DG();
378
379 VecTotResDOFsADER.assign(nVar*nDOFsLocTot, 0.0);
380 VecSolDOFsPredictorADER.resize(nTimeDOFs*nVar*nDOFsLocTot);
381 }
382 else {
383
384 /*--- Runge Kutta type of time integration schemes. Allocate the memory to
385 possibly store the new solution. ---*/
386 if(config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == CLASSICAL_RK4_EXPLICIT)
387 VecSolDOFsNew.resize(nVar*nDOFsLocOwned);
388 }
389
390 /*--- Determine the global number of DOFs. ---*/
391#ifdef HAVE_MPI
392 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nDOFsLocOwned, &nDOFsGlobal, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
393#else
394 nDOFsGlobal = nDOFsLocOwned;
395#endif
396
397 /*--- Store the number of DOFs in the geometry class in case of restart. ---*/
398 geometry->SetnPointDomain(nDOFsLocOwned);
399 geometry->SetGlobal_nPointDomain(nDOFsGlobal);
400
401 /*--- Allocate the memory to store the time steps, residuals, etc. ---*/
402 VecDeltaTime.resize(nVolElemOwned);
403
404 if(config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == ADER_DG)
405 VecResDOFs.resize(nVar*nDOFsLocOwned);
406 else
407 VecResDOFs.resize(nVar*nDOFsLocTot);
408
409 nEntriesResFaces.assign(nDOFsLocTot+1, 0);
410 nEntriesResAdjFaces.assign(nDOFsLocTot+1, 0);
411 startLocResFacesMarkers.resize(nMarker);
412
413 startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem.assign(nTimeLevels+1, 0);
414 startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem.assign(nTimeLevels+1, 0);
415
416 /*--- Determine the size of the vector to store residuals that come from the
417 integral over the faces and determine the number of entries in this
418 vector for the local DOFs. ---*/
419 symmetrizingTermsPresent = false;
420 if(config->GetViscous() && (fabs(config->GetTheta_Interior_Penalty_DGFEM()) > 1.e-8))
421 symmetrizingTermsPresent = true;
422
423 /*--- First the internal matching faces. ---*/
424 unsigned long sizeVecResFaces = 0;
425 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem[nTimeLevels]; ++i) {
426
427 /* Determine the time level of the face. */
428 const unsigned long elem0 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID0;
429 const unsigned long elem1 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID1;
430 const unsigned short timeLevel = min(volElem[elem0].timeLevel,
431 volElem[elem1].timeLevel);
432
433 /* The terms that only contribute to the DOFs located on the face.
434 Check the time level of the element compared to the face. */
435 const unsigned short ind = matchingInternalFaces[i].indStandardElement;
436 const unsigned short nDOFsFace0 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFaceSide0();
437 const unsigned short nDOFsFace1 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFaceSide1();
438
439 sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsFace0;
440 if(timeLevel == volElem[elem0].timeLevel) {
441 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace0; ++j)
442 ++nEntriesResFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide0[j]+1];
443 }
444 else {
445 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace0; ++j)
446 ++nEntriesResAdjFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide0[j]+1];
447 }
448
449 sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsFace1;
450 if(timeLevel == volElem[elem1].timeLevel) {
451 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace1; ++j)
452 ++nEntriesResFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide1[j]+1];
453 }
454 else {
455 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace1; ++j)
456 ++nEntriesResAdjFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide1[j]+1];
457 }
458
459 /* The symmetrizing terms, if present, contribute to all
460 the DOFs of the adjacent elements. */
461 if( symmetrizingTermsPresent ) {
462 const unsigned short nDOFsElem0 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElemSide0();
463 const unsigned short nDOFsElem1 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElemSide1();
464
465 sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsElem0;
466 if(timeLevel == volElem[elem0].timeLevel) {
467 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem0; ++j)
468 ++nEntriesResFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide0[j]+1];
469 }
470 else {
471 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem0; ++j)
472 ++nEntriesResAdjFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide0[j]+1];
473 }
474
475 sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsElem1;
476 if(timeLevel == volElem[elem1].timeLevel) {
477 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem1; ++j)
478 ++nEntriesResFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide1[j]+1];
479 }
480 else {
481 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem1; ++j)
482 ++nEntriesResAdjFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide1[j]+1];
483 }
484 }
485
486 /* Store the position of the residual in the appropriate entry. */
487 if(i < nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem[0] )
488 startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[timeLevel+1] = sizeVecResFaces;
489 else
490 startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[timeLevel+1] = sizeVecResFaces;
491 }
492
493 /* Set the uninitialized values of startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem. */
494 for(unsigned short i=1; i<=nTimeLevels; ++i) {
495 if(startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[i] == 0)
496 startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[i] = startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[i-1];
497 }
498
499 /* Set the uninitialized values of startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem. */
500 startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[0] = startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[nTimeLevels];
501
502 for(unsigned short i=1; i<=nTimeLevels; ++i) {
503 if(startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[i] == 0)
504 startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[i] = startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[i-1];
505 }
506
507 /* The physical boundary faces. Exclude the periodic boundaries,
508 because these are not physical boundaries. */
509 for(unsigned short iMarker=0; iMarker<nMarker; ++iMarker) {
510 startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker].assign(nTimeLevels+1, 0);
511 startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][0] = sizeVecResFaces;
512
513 if( !(boundaries[iMarker].periodicBoundary) ) {
514
515 /* Easier storage of the variables for this boundary. */
516 const unsigned long nSurfElem = boundaries[iMarker].surfElem.size();
517 const CSurfaceElementFEM *surfElem = boundaries[iMarker].surfElem.data();
518
519 /*--- Loop over the surface elements and update the required data. ---*/
520 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nSurfElem; ++i) {
521 const unsigned short ind = surfElem[i].indStandardElement;
522 const unsigned short nDOFsFace = standardBoundaryFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFace();
523
524 /* The terms that only contribute to the DOFs located on the face. */
525 sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsFace;
526 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace; ++j)
527 ++nEntriesResFaces[surfElem[i].DOFsSolFace[j]+1];
528
529 /* The symmetrizing terms, if present, contribute to all
530 the DOFs of the adjacent elements. */
531 if( symmetrizingTermsPresent ) {
532 const unsigned short nDOFsElem = standardBoundaryFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElem();
533
534 sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsElem;
535 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem; ++j)
536 ++nEntriesResFaces[surfElem[i].DOFsSolElement[j]+1];
537 }
538
539 /* Determine the time level of the adjacent element and store the position of the
540 residual in the appropriate entry. */
541 const unsigned short timeLevel = volElem[surfElem[i].volElemID].timeLevel;
542 startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][timeLevel+1] = sizeVecResFaces;
543 }
544 }
545
546 /* Set the unitialized values of startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker]. */
547 for(unsigned short i=1; i<=nTimeLevels; ++i) {
548 if(startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][i] == 0)
549 startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][i] = startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][i-1];
550 }
551 }
552
553 /*--- Put nEntriesResFaces and nEntriesResAdjFaces in cumulative storage
554 format and allocate the memory for entriesResFaces, entriesResAdjFaces
555 and VecResFaces. ---*/
556 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocTot; ++i) {
557 nEntriesResFaces[i+1] += nEntriesResFaces[i];
558 nEntriesResAdjFaces[i+1] += nEntriesResAdjFaces[i];
559 }
560
561 entriesResFaces.resize(nEntriesResFaces[nDOFsLocTot]);
562 entriesResAdjFaces.resize(nEntriesResAdjFaces[nDOFsLocTot]);
563 VecResFaces.resize(nVar*sizeVecResFaces);
564
565 /*--- Repeat the loops over the internal and boundary faces, but now store
566 the entries in entriesResFaces and entriesResAdjFaces. A counter
567 variable is needed to keep track of the appropriate location in
568 entriesResFaces and entriesResAdjFaces. ---*/
569 vector<unsigned long> counterEntries = nEntriesResFaces;
570 vector<unsigned long> counterEntriesAdj = nEntriesResAdjFaces;
571
572 /* First the loop over the internal matching faces. */
573 sizeVecResFaces = 0;
574 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem[nTimeLevels]; ++i) {
575
576 /* Determine the time level of the face. */
577 const unsigned long elem0 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID0;
578 const unsigned long elem1 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID1;
579 const unsigned short timeLevel = min(volElem[elem0].timeLevel,
580 volElem[elem1].timeLevel);
581
582 /* The terms that only contribute to the DOFs located on the face. */
583 const unsigned short ind = matchingInternalFaces[i].indStandardElement;
584 const unsigned short nDOFsFace0 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFaceSide0();
585 const unsigned short nDOFsFace1 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFaceSide1();
586
587 if(timeLevel == volElem[elem0].timeLevel) {
588 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace0; ++j) {
589 const unsigned long jj = counterEntries[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide0[j]]++;
590 entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
591 }
592 }
593 else {
594 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace0; ++j) {
595 const unsigned long jj = counterEntriesAdj[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide0[j]]++;
596 entriesResAdjFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
597 }
598 }
599
600 if(timeLevel == volElem[elem1].timeLevel) {
601 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace1; ++j) {
602 const unsigned long jj = counterEntries[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide1[j]]++;
603 entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
604 }
605 }
606 else {
607 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace1; ++j) {
608 const unsigned long jj = counterEntriesAdj[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide1[j]]++;
609 entriesResAdjFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
610 }
611 }
612
613 /* The symmetrizing terms, if present, contribute to all
614 the DOFs of the adjacent elements. */
615 if( symmetrizingTermsPresent ) {
616 const unsigned short nDOFsElem0 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElemSide0();
617 const unsigned short nDOFsElem1 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElemSide1();
618
619 if(timeLevel == volElem[elem0].timeLevel) {
620 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem0; ++j) {
621 const unsigned long jj = counterEntries[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide0[j]]++;
622 entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
623 }
624 }
625 else {
626 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem0; ++j) {
627 const unsigned long jj = counterEntriesAdj[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide0[j]]++;
628 entriesResAdjFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
629 }
630 }
631
632 if(timeLevel == volElem[elem1].timeLevel) {
633 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem1; ++j) {
634 const unsigned long jj = counterEntries[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide1[j]]++;
635 entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
636 }
637 }
638 else {
639 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem1; ++j) {
640 const unsigned long jj = counterEntriesAdj[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide1[j]]++;
641 entriesResAdjFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
642 }
643 }
644 }
645 }
646
647 /* And the physical boundary faces. Exclude the periodic boundaries,
648 because these are not physical boundaries. */
649 for(unsigned short iMarker=0; iMarker<nMarker; ++iMarker) {
650 if( !(boundaries[iMarker].periodicBoundary) ) {
651
652 /* Easier storage of the variables for this boundary. */
653 const unsigned long nSurfElem = boundaries[iMarker].surfElem.size();
654 const CSurfaceElementFEM *surfElem = boundaries[iMarker].surfElem.data();
655
656 /*--- Loop over the surface elements to set entriesResFaces. ---*/
657 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nSurfElem; ++i) {
658
659 /* The terms that only contribute to the DOFs located on the face. */
660 const unsigned short ind = surfElem[i].indStandardElement;
661 const unsigned short nDOFsFace = standardBoundaryFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFace();
662
663 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace; ++j) {
664 unsigned long jj = counterEntries[surfElem[i].DOFsSolFace[j]]++;
665 entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
666 }
667
668 /* The symmetrizing terms, if present, contribute to all
669 the DOFs of the adjacent elements. */
670 if( symmetrizingTermsPresent ) {
671 const unsigned short nDOFsElem = standardBoundaryFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElem();
672
673 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem; ++j) {
674 unsigned long jj = counterEntries[surfElem[i].DOFsSolElement[j]]++;
675 entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
676 }
677 }
678 }
679 }
680 }
681
682 /*--- Start the solution from the free-stream state. This is overruled
683 when a restart takes place. ---*/
684 unsigned long ii = 0;
685 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i) {
686 for(unsigned short j=0; j<nVar; ++j, ++ii) {
687 VecSolDOFs[ii] = ConsVarFreeStream[j];
688 }
689 }
690
691 /* Check if the exact Jacobian of the spatial discretization must be
692 determined. If so, the color of each DOF must be determined, which
693 is converted to the DOFs for each color. */
694 if( config->GetJacobian_Spatial_Discretization_Only() ) {
695
696 /* Write a message that the graph coloring is performed. */
697 if(rank == MASTER_NODE)
698 cout << "Creating the vertex colors of the graph. " << std::endl;
699
700 /* Determine the graph of the stencil of every local DOF. */
701 DetermineGraphDOFs(DGGeometry, config);
702
703 /* Carry out the vertex coloring of the graph. */
704 CGraphColoringStructure graphColoring;
705 vector<int> colorLocalDOFs;
706 graphColoring.GraphVertexColoring(config, nDOFsPerRank, nonZeroEntriesJacobian,
707 nGlobalColors, colorLocalDOFs);
708
709 /* Write a message that the all volume DOFs have been colored. */
710 if(rank == MASTER_NODE)
711 cout << "There are " << nGlobalColors
712 << " colors present in the graph for " << nDOFsPerRank.back()
713 << " DOFs." << std::endl;
714
715 /* Determine the meta data needed for the computation of the Jacobian. */
716 MetaDataJacobianComputation(DGGeometry, colorLocalDOFs);
717 }
718
719 /* Set up the persistent communication for the conservative variables and
720 the reverse communication for the residuals of the halo elements. */
721 Prepare_MPI_Communication(DGGeometry, config);
722
723 /* Set up the list of tasks to be carried out in the computational expensive
724 part of the code. For the Runge-Kutta schemes this is typically the
725 computation of the spatial residual, while for ADER this list contains
726 the tasks to be done for one space time step. */
727 SetUpTaskList(config);
728
729 /*--- Add the solver name. ---*/
730 SolverName = "DG.FLOW";
731}
732
733CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::~CFEM_DG_EulerSolver() {
734
735 delete FluidModel;
736 delete blasFunctions;
737
738 /*--- Array deallocation ---*/
739 delete [] CD_Inv;
740 delete [] CL_Inv;
741 delete [] CSF_Inv;
742 delete [] CMx_Inv;
743 delete [] CMy_Inv;
744 delete [] CMz_Inv;
745 delete [] CFx_Inv;
746 delete [] CFy_Inv;
747 delete [] CFz_Inv;
748 delete [] Surface_CL_Inv;
749 delete [] Surface_CD_Inv;
750 delete [] Surface_CSF_Inv;
751 delete [] Surface_CEff_Inv;
752 delete [] Surface_CFx_Inv;
753 delete [] Surface_CFy_Inv;
754 delete [] Surface_CFz_Inv;
755 delete [] Surface_CMx_Inv;
756 delete [] Surface_CMy_Inv;
757 delete [] Surface_CMz_Inv;
758 delete [] Surface_CL;
759 delete [] Surface_CD;
760 delete [] Surface_CSF;
761 delete [] Surface_CEff;
762 delete [] Surface_CFx;
763 delete [] Surface_CFy;
764 delete [] Surface_CFz;
765 delete [] Surface_CMx;
766 delete [] Surface_CMy;
767 delete [] Surface_CMz;
768 delete [] CEff_Inv;
769
770}
771
772void CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::SetNondimensionalization(CConfig *config,
773 unsigned short iMesh,
774 const bool writeOutput) {
775
776 su2double Temperature_FreeStream = 0.0, Mach2Vel_FreeStream = 0.0, ModVel_FreeStream = 0.0,
777 Energy_FreeStream = 0.0, ModVel_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Velocity_Reynolds = 0.0,
778 Omega_FreeStream = 0.0, Omega_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Viscosity_FreeStream = 0.0,
779 Density_FreeStream = 0.0, Pressure_FreeStream = 0.0, Tke_FreeStream = 0.0,
780 Length_Ref = 0.0, Density_Ref = 0.0, Pressure_Ref = 0.0, Velocity_Ref = 0.0,
781 Temperature_Ref = 0.0, Time_Ref = 0.0, Omega_Ref = 0.0, Force_Ref = 0.0,
782 Gas_Constant_Ref = 0.0, Viscosity_Ref = 0.0, Conductivity_Ref = 0.0, Energy_Ref= 0.0,
783 Froude = 0.0, Pressure_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Density_FreeStreamND = 0.0,
784 Temperature_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Gas_ConstantND = 0.0,
785 Velocity_FreeStreamND[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, Viscosity_FreeStreamND = 0.0,
786 Tke_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Energy_FreeStreamND = 0.0,
787 Total_UnstTimeND = 0.0, Delta_UnstTimeND = 0.0;
788
789 unsigned short iDim;
790
791 /*--- Local variables ---*/
792
793 su2double Alpha = config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
794 su2double Beta = config->GetAoS()*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
795 su2double Mach = config->GetMach();
796 su2double Reynolds = config->GetReynolds();
797 bool unsteady = (config->GetTime_Marching() != TIME_MARCHING::STEADY);
798 bool viscous = config->GetViscous();
799 bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
800 bool turbulent = (config->GetKind_Solver() == MAIN_SOLVER::FEM_RANS) || (config->GetKind_Solver() == MAIN_SOLVER::FEM_LES);
801 bool tkeNeeded = ((turbulent) && ((config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == TURB_MODEL::SST) ));
802 bool free_stream_temp = (config->GetKind_FreeStreamOption() == FREESTREAM_OPTION::TEMPERATURE_FS);
803 bool reynolds_init = (config->GetKind_InitOption() == REYNOLDS);
804
805 /*--- Compute the Free Stream velocity, using the Mach number ---*/
806
807 Pressure_FreeStream = config->GetPressure_FreeStream();
808 Density_FreeStream = config->GetDensity_FreeStream();
809 Temperature_FreeStream = config->GetTemperature_FreeStream();
810
811 /*--- The dimensional viscosity is needed to determine the free-stream conditions.
812 To accomplish this, simply set the non-dimensional coefficients to the
813 dimensional ones. This will be overruled later.---*/
814
815 config->SetTemperature_Ref(1.0);
816 config->SetViscosity_Ref(1.0);
817 config->SetConductivity_Ref(1.0);
818
819 switch (config->GetKind_FluidModel()) {
820
821 case STANDARD_AIR:
822
823 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) config->SetGas_Constant(287.058);
824 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) config->SetGas_Constant(1716.49);
825
826 FluidModel = new CIdealGas(1.4, config->GetGas_Constant(), config->GetCompute_Entropy());
827 if (free_stream_temp) {
828 FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
829 Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
830 config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
831 }
832 else {
833 FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
834 Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
835 config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
836 }
837 break;
838
839 case IDEAL_GAS:
840
841 FluidModel = new CIdealGas(Gamma, config->GetGas_Constant(), config->GetCompute_Entropy());
842 if (free_stream_temp) {
843 FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
844 Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
845 config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
846 }
847 else {
848 FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
849 Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
850 config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
851 }
852 break;
853
854 case VW_GAS:
855
856 FluidModel = new CVanDerWaalsGas(Gamma, config->GetGas_Constant(),
857 config->GetPressure_Critical(), config->GetTemperature_Critical());
858 if (free_stream_temp) {
859 FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
860 Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
861 config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
862 }
863 else {
864 FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
865 Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
866 config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
867 }
868 break;
869
870 case PR_GAS:
871
872 FluidModel = new CPengRobinson(Gamma, config->GetGas_Constant(), config->GetPressure_Critical(),
873 config->GetTemperature_Critical(), config->GetAcentric_Factor());
874 if (free_stream_temp) {
875 FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
876 Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
877 config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
878 }
879 else {
880 FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
881 Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
882 config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
883 }
884 break;
885
886 case COOLPROP:
887
888 FluidModel = new CCoolProp(config->GetFluid_Name());
889 if (free_stream_temp) {
890 FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
891 Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
892 config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
893 }
894 else {
895 FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
896 Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
897 config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
898 }
899 break;
900
901 case DATADRIVEN_FLUID:
902 FluidModel = new CDataDrivenFluid(config, false);
903 if (free_stream_temp) {
904 FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
905 Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
906 config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
907 }
908 else {
909 FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
910 Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
911 config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
912 }
913
914 break;
915 }
916
917 Mach2Vel_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetSoundSpeed();
918
919 /*--- Compute the Free Stream velocity, using the Mach number ---*/
920
921 if (nDim == 2) {
922 config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[0] = cos(Alpha)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
923 config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[1] = sin(Alpha)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
924 }
925 if (nDim == 3) {
926 config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[0] = cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
927 config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[1] = sin(Beta)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
928 config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[2] = sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
929 }
930
931 /*--- Compute the modulus of the free stream velocity ---*/
932
933 ModVel_FreeStream = 0.0;
934 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
935 ModVel_FreeStream += config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[iDim]*config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[iDim];
936 ModVel_FreeStream = sqrt(ModVel_FreeStream); config->SetModVel_FreeStream(ModVel_FreeStream);
937
938 /*--- Viscous initialization ---*/
939
940 if (viscous) {
941
942 /*--- Reynolds based initialization ---*/
943
944 if (reynolds_init) {
945
946 /*--- First, check if there is mesh motion. If yes, use the Mach
947 number relative to the body to initialize the flow. ---*/
948
949 if (grid_movement) Velocity_Reynolds = config->GetMach_Motion()*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
950 else Velocity_Reynolds = ModVel_FreeStream;
951
952 /*--- For viscous flows, pressure will be computed from a density
953 that is found from the Reynolds number. The viscosity is computed
954 from the dimensional version of Sutherland's law or the constant
955 viscosity, depending on the input option.---*/
956
957 FluidModel->SetLaminarViscosityModel(config);
958
959 Viscosity_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetLaminarViscosity();
960 config->SetViscosity_FreeStream(Viscosity_FreeStream);
961
962 Density_FreeStream = Reynolds*Viscosity_FreeStream/(Velocity_Reynolds*config->GetLength_Reynolds());
963 config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
964 FluidModel->SetTDState_rhoT(Density_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
965 Pressure_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetPressure();
966 config->SetPressure_FreeStream(Pressure_FreeStream);
967 Energy_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetStaticEnergy() + 0.5*ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream;
968
969 }
970
971 /*--- Thermodynamics quantities based initialization ---*/
972
973 else {
974
975 FluidModel->SetLaminarViscosityModel(config);
976 Viscosity_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetLaminarViscosity();
977 config->SetViscosity_FreeStream(Viscosity_FreeStream);
978 Energy_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetStaticEnergy() + 0.5*ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream;
979
980 }
981
982 /*--- Turbulence kinetic energy ---*/
983
984 Tke_FreeStream = 3.0/2.0*(ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream()*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream());
985
986 }
987 else {
988
989 /*--- For inviscid flow, energy is calculated from the specified
990 FreeStream quantities using the proper gas law. ---*/
991
992 Energy_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetStaticEnergy() + 0.5*ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream;
993
994 }
995
996 /*-- Compute the freestream energy. ---*/
997
998 if (tkeNeeded) { Energy_FreeStream += Tke_FreeStream; }; config->SetEnergy_FreeStream(Energy_FreeStream);
999
1000 /*--- Compute non dimensional quantities. By definition,
1001 Lref is one because we have converted the grid to meters. ---*/
1002
1003 if (config->GetRef_NonDim() == DIMENSIONAL) {
1004 Pressure_Ref = 1.0;
1005 Density_Ref = 1.0;
1006 Temperature_Ref = 1.0;
1007 }
1008 else if (config->GetRef_NonDim() == FREESTREAM_PRESS_EQ_ONE) {
1009 Pressure_Ref = Pressure_FreeStream; // Pressure_FreeStream = 1.0
1010 Density_Ref = Density_FreeStream; // Density_FreeStream = 1.0
1011 Temperature_Ref = Temperature_FreeStream; // Temperature_FreeStream = 1.0
1012 }
1013 else if (config->GetRef_NonDim() == FREESTREAM_VEL_EQ_MACH) {
1014 Pressure_Ref = Gamma*Pressure_FreeStream; // Pressure_FreeStream = 1.0/Gamma
1015 Density_Ref = Density_FreeStream; // Density_FreeStream = 1.0
1016 Temperature_Ref = Temperature_FreeStream; // Temp_FreeStream = 1.0
1017 }
1018 else if (config->GetRef_NonDim() == FREESTREAM_VEL_EQ_ONE) {
1019 Pressure_Ref = Mach*Mach*Gamma*Pressure_FreeStream; // Pressure_FreeStream = 1.0/(Gamma*(M_inf)^2)
1020 Density_Ref = Density_FreeStream; // Density_FreeStream = 1.0
1021 Temperature_Ref = Temperature_FreeStream; // Temp_FreeStream = 1.0
1022 }
1023 config->SetPressure_Ref(Pressure_Ref);
1024 config->SetDensity_Ref(Density_Ref);
1025 config->SetTemperature_Ref(Temperature_Ref);
1026
1027 Length_Ref = 1.0; config->SetLength_Ref(Length_Ref);
1028 Velocity_Ref = sqrt(config->GetPressure_Ref()/config->GetDensity_Ref()); config->SetVelocity_Ref(Velocity_Ref);
1029 Time_Ref = Length_Ref/Velocity_Ref; config->SetTime_Ref(Time_Ref);
1030 Omega_Ref = Velocity_Ref/Length_Ref; config->SetOmega_Ref(Omega_Ref);
1031 Force_Ref = Velocity_Ref*Velocity_Ref/Length_Ref; config->SetForce_Ref(Force_Ref);
1032 Gas_Constant_Ref = Velocity_Ref*Velocity_Ref/config->GetTemperature_Ref(); config->SetGas_Constant_Ref(Gas_Constant_Ref);
1033 Viscosity_Ref = config->GetDensity_Ref()*Velocity_Ref*Length_Ref; config->SetViscosity_Ref(Viscosity_Ref);
1034 Conductivity_Ref = Viscosity_Ref*Gas_Constant_Ref; config->SetConductivity_Ref(Conductivity_Ref);
1035 Froude = ModVel_FreeStream/sqrt(STANDARD_GRAVITY*Length_Ref); config->SetFroude(Froude);
1036
1037 /*--- Divide by reference values, to compute the non-dimensional free-stream values ---*/
1038
1039 Pressure_FreeStreamND = Pressure_FreeStream/config->GetPressure_Ref(); config->SetPressure_FreeStreamND(Pressure_FreeStreamND);
1040 Density_FreeStreamND = Density_FreeStream/config->GetDensity_Ref(); config->SetDensity_FreeStreamND(Density_FreeStreamND);
1041
1042 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
1043 Velocity_FreeStreamND[iDim] = config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[iDim]/Velocity_Ref; config->SetVelocity_FreeStreamND(Velocity_FreeStreamND[iDim], iDim);
1044 }
1045
1046 Temperature_FreeStreamND = Temperature_FreeStream/config->GetTemperature_Ref(); config->SetTemperature_FreeStreamND(Temperature_FreeStreamND);
1047
1048 Gas_ConstantND = config->GetGas_Constant()/Gas_Constant_Ref; config->SetGas_ConstantND(Gas_ConstantND);
1049
1050
1051 ModVel_FreeStreamND = 0.0;
1052 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) ModVel_FreeStreamND += Velocity_FreeStreamND[iDim]*Velocity_FreeStreamND[iDim];
1053 ModVel_FreeStreamND = sqrt(ModVel_FreeStreamND); config->SetModVel_FreeStreamND(ModVel_FreeStreamND);
1054
1055 Viscosity_FreeStreamND = Viscosity_FreeStream / Viscosity_Ref; config->SetViscosity_FreeStreamND(Viscosity_FreeStreamND);
1056
1057 Tke_FreeStream = 3.0/2.0*(ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream()*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream());
1058 config->SetTke_FreeStream(Tke_FreeStream);
1059
1060 Tke_FreeStreamND = 3.0/2.0*(ModVel_FreeStreamND*ModVel_FreeStreamND*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream()*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream());
1061 config->SetTke_FreeStreamND(Tke_FreeStreamND);
1062
1063 Omega_FreeStream = Density_FreeStream*Tke_FreeStream/max((Viscosity_FreeStream*config->GetTurb2LamViscRatio_FreeStream()), 1.e-25);
1064 config->SetOmega_FreeStream(Omega_FreeStream);
1065
1066 Omega_FreeStreamND = Density_FreeStreamND*Tke_FreeStreamND/max((Viscosity_FreeStreamND*config->GetTurb2LamViscRatio_FreeStream()), 1.e-25);
1067 config->SetOmega_FreeStreamND(Omega_FreeStreamND);
1068
1069 /*--- Initialize the dimensionless Fluid Model that will be used to solve the dimensionless problem ---*/
1070
1071 /*--- Delete the original (dimensional) FluidModel object before replacing. ---*/
1072
1073 delete FluidModel;
1074
1075 switch (config->GetKind_FluidModel()) {
1076
1077 case STANDARD_AIR:
1078 FluidModel = new CIdealGas(1.4, Gas_ConstantND, config->GetCompute_Entropy());
1079 FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1080 break;
1081
1082 case IDEAL_GAS:
1083 FluidModel = new CIdealGas(Gamma, Gas_ConstantND, config->GetCompute_Entropy());
1084 FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1085 break;
1086
1087 case VW_GAS:
1088 FluidModel = new CVanDerWaalsGas(Gamma, Gas_ConstantND, config->GetPressure_Critical() /config->GetPressure_Ref(),
1089 config->GetTemperature_Critical()/config->GetTemperature_Ref());
1090 FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1091 break;
1092
1093 case PR_GAS:
1094 FluidModel = new CPengRobinson(Gamma, Gas_ConstantND, config->GetPressure_Critical() /config->GetPressure_Ref(),
1095 config->GetTemperature_Critical()/config->GetTemperature_Ref(), config->GetAcentric_Factor());
1096 FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1097 break;
1098
1099 case COOLPROP:
1100 FluidModel = new CCoolProp(config->GetFluid_Name());
1101 FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1102 break;
1103
1104 case DATADRIVEN_FLUID:
1105 FluidModel = new CDataDrivenFluid(config);
1106 FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1107 break;
1108 }
1109
1110 Energy_FreeStreamND = FluidModel->GetStaticEnergy() + 0.5*ModVel_FreeStreamND*ModVel_FreeStreamND;
1111
1112 if (viscous) {
1113 FluidModel->SetLaminarViscosityModel(config);
1114 FluidModel->SetThermalConductivityModel(config);
1115 FluidModel->SetMassDiffusivityModel(config); // nijso: TODO, needs to be tested
1116 }
1117
1118 if (tkeNeeded) { Energy_FreeStreamND += Tke_FreeStreamND; }; config->SetEnergy_FreeStreamND(Energy_FreeStreamND);
1119
1120 Energy_Ref = Energy_FreeStream/Energy_FreeStreamND; config->SetEnergy_Ref(Energy_Ref);
1121
1122 Total_UnstTimeND = config->GetTotal_UnstTime() / Time_Ref; config->SetTotal_UnstTimeND(Total_UnstTimeND);
1123 Delta_UnstTimeND = config->GetDelta_UnstTime() / Time_Ref; config->SetDelta_UnstTimeND(Delta_UnstTimeND);
1124
1125 /*--- Write output to the console if this is required and if this is the master node and first domain ---*/
1126
1127 if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (iMesh == MESH_0) && writeOutput) {
1128
1129 cout.precision(6);
1130
1131 if (viscous) {
1132 cout << "Viscous flow: Computing pressure using the ideal gas law" << endl;
1133 cout << "based on the free-stream temperature and a density computed" << endl;
1134 cout << "from the Reynolds number." << endl;
1135 } else {
1136 cout << "Inviscid flow: Computing density based on free-stream" << endl;
1137 cout << "temperature and pressure using the ideal gas law." << endl;
1138 }
1139
1140 if (grid_movement) cout << "Force coefficients computed using MACH_MOTION." << endl;
1141 else cout << "Force coefficients computed using free-stream values." << endl;
1142
1143 stringstream NonDimTableOut, ModelTableOut;
1144 stringstream Unit;
1145
1146 cout << endl;
1147 PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter ModelTable(&ModelTableOut);
1148 ModelTableOut <<"-- Models:"<< endl;
1149
1150 ModelTable.AddColumn("Viscosity Model", 25);
1151 ModelTable.AddColumn("Conductivity Model", 26);
1152 ModelTable.AddColumn("Fluid Model", 25);
1153 ModelTable.SetAlign(PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter::RIGHT);
1154 ModelTable.PrintHeader();
1155
1156 PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter NonDimTable(&NonDimTableOut);
1157 NonDimTable.AddColumn("Name", 22);
1158 NonDimTable.AddColumn("Dim. value", 14);
1159 NonDimTable.AddColumn("Ref. value", 14);
1160 NonDimTable.AddColumn("Unit", 10);
1161 NonDimTable.AddColumn("Non-dim. value", 14);
1162 NonDimTable.SetAlign(PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter::RIGHT);
1163
1164 NonDimTableOut <<"-- Fluid properties:"<< endl;
1165
1166 NonDimTable.PrintHeader();
1167
1168 if (viscous) {
1169
1170 switch(config->GetKind_ViscosityModel()){
1171 case VISCOSITYMODEL::CONSTANT:
1172 ModelTable << "CONSTANT_VISCOSITY";
1173 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.s/m^2";
1174 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.s/ft^2";
1175 NonDimTable << "Viscosity" << config->GetMu_Constant() << config->GetMu_Constant()/config->GetMu_ConstantND() << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_ConstantND();
1176 Unit.str("");
1177 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1178 break;
1179
1180 case VISCOSITYMODEL::COOLPROP:
1181 ModelTable << "COOLPROP";
1182 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.s/m^2";
1183 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.s/ft^2";
1184 NonDimTable << "Viscosity" << "--" << "--" << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_ConstantND();
1185 Unit.str("");
1186 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1187 break;
1188
1189 case VISCOSITYMODEL::SUTHERLAND:
1190 ModelTable << "SUTHERLAND";
1191 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.s/m^2";
1192 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.s/ft^2";
1193 NonDimTable << "Ref. Viscosity" << config->GetMu_Ref() << config->GetViscosity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_RefND();
1194 Unit.str("");
1195 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "K";
1196 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "R";
1197 NonDimTable << "Sutherland Temp." << config->GetMu_Temperature_Ref() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_Temperature_RefND();
1198 Unit.str("");
1199 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "K";
1200 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "R";
1201 NonDimTable << "Sutherland Const." << config->GetMu_S() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_SND();
1202 Unit.str("");
1203 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1204 break;
1205
1206 default:
1207 break;
1208
1209 }
1210 switch(config->GetKind_ConductivityModel()){
1211 case CONDUCTIVITYMODEL::CONSTANT_PRANDTL:
1212 ModelTable << "CONSTANT_PRANDTL";
1213 NonDimTable << "Prandtl (Lam.)" << "-" << "-" << "-" << config->GetPrandtl_Lam();
1214 Unit.str("");
1215 NonDimTable << "Prandtl (Turb.)" << "-" << "-" << "-" << config->GetPrandtl_Turb();
1216 Unit.str("");
1217 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1218 break;
1219
1220 case CONDUCTIVITYMODEL::CONSTANT:
1221 ModelTable << "CONSTANT";
1222 Unit << "W/m^2.K";
1223 NonDimTable << "Molecular Cond." << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_Constant() << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_Constant()/config->GetThermal_Conductivity_ConstantND() << Unit.str() << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_ConstantND();
1224 Unit.str("");
1225 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1226 break;
1227
1228 case CONDUCTIVITYMODEL::COOLPROP:
1229 ModelTable << "COOLPROP";
1230 Unit << "W/m^2.K";
1231 NonDimTable << "Molecular Cond." << "--" << "--" << Unit.str() << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_ConstantND();
1232 Unit.str("");
1233 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1234 break;
1235
1236 default:
1237 break;
1238
1239 }
1240 } else {
1241 ModelTable << "-" << "-";
1242 }
1243
1244 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.m/kg.K";
1245 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.ft/slug.R";
1246 if (config->GetKind_FluidModel() == COOLPROP) {
1247 CCoolProp auxFluidModel(config->GetFluid_Name());
1248 NonDimTable << "Gas Constant" << auxFluidModel.GetGas_Constant() << config->GetGas_Constant_Ref()
1249 << Unit.str() << auxFluidModel.GetGas_Constant()/config->GetGas_Constant_Ref();
1250 }
1251 else {
1252 NonDimTable << "Gas Constant" << config->GetGas_Constant() << config->GetGas_Constant_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetGas_ConstantND();
1253 }
1254 Unit.str("");
1255 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.m/kg.K";
1256 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.ft/slug.R";
1257 if (config->GetKind_FluidModel() == COOLPROP) {
1258 NonDimTable << "Spec. Heat Ratio" << "-" << "-" << "-" << "-";
1259 }
1260 else {
1261 NonDimTable << "Spec. Heat Ratio" << "-" << "-" << "-" << Gamma;
1262 }
1263 Unit.str("");
1264
1265 switch(config->GetKind_FluidModel()){
1266 case STANDARD_AIR:
1267 ModelTable << "STANDARD_AIR";
1268 break;
1269 case IDEAL_GAS:
1270 ModelTable << "IDEAL_GAS";
1271 break;
1272 case VW_GAS:
1273 ModelTable << "VW_GAS";
1274 break;
1275 case PR_GAS:
1276 ModelTable << "PR_GAS";
1277 break;
1278 case COOLPROP:
1279 ModelTable << "CoolProp library";
1280 break;
1281 }
1282
1283 if (config->GetKind_FluidModel() == VW_GAS || config->GetKind_FluidModel() == PR_GAS){
1284 NonDimTable << "Critical Pressure" << config->GetPressure_Critical() << config->GetPressure_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetPressure_Critical() /config->GetPressure_Ref();
1285 Unit.str("");
1286 Unit << "K";
1287 NonDimTable << "Critical Temperature" << config->GetTemperature_Critical() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetTemperature_Critical() /config->GetTemperature_Ref();
1288 Unit.str("");
1289 }
1290 if (config->GetKind_FluidModel() == COOLPROP) {
1291 CCoolProp auxFluidModel(config->GetFluid_Name());
1292 NonDimTable << "Critical Pressure" << auxFluidModel.GetPressure_Critical() << config->GetPressure_Ref() << Unit.str() << auxFluidModel.GetPressure_Critical() /config->GetPressure_Ref();
1293 Unit.str("");
1294 Unit << "K";
1295 NonDimTable << "Critical Temperature" << auxFluidModel.GetTemperature_Critical() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << auxFluidModel.GetTemperature_Critical() /config->GetTemperature_Ref();
1296 Unit.str("");
1297 }
1298 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1299
1300 NonDimTableOut <<"-- Initial and free-stream conditions:"<< endl;
1301
1302 NonDimTable.PrintHeader();
1303
1304 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "Pa";
1305 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "psf";
1306 NonDimTable << "Static Pressure" << config->GetPressure_FreeStream() << config->GetPressure_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetPressure_FreeStreamND();
1307 Unit.str("");
1308 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "kg/m^3";
1309 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "slug/ft^3";
1310 NonDimTable << "Density" << config->GetDensity_FreeStream() << config->GetDensity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
1311 Unit.str("");
1312 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "K";
1313 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "R";
1314 NonDimTable << "Temperature" << config->GetTemperature_FreeStream() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND();
1315 Unit.str("");
1316 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "m^2/s^2";
1317 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "ft^2/s^2";
1318 NonDimTable << "Total Energy" << config->GetEnergy_FreeStream() << config->GetEnergy_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetEnergy_FreeStreamND();
1319 Unit.str("");
1320 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "m/s";
1321 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "ft/s";
1322 NonDimTable << "Velocity-X" << config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[0] << config->GetVelocity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND()[0];
1323 NonDimTable << "Velocity-Y" << config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[1] << config->GetVelocity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND()[1];
1324 if (nDim == 3) {
1325 NonDimTable << "Velocity-Z" << config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[2] << config->GetVelocity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND()[2];
1326 }
1327 NonDimTable << "Velocity Magnitude" << config->GetModVel_FreeStream() << config->GetVelocity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetModVel_FreeStreamND();
1328 Unit.str("");
1329
1330 if (viscous) {
1331 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1332 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.s/m^2";
1333 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.s/ft^2";
1334 NonDimTable << "Viscosity" << config->GetViscosity_FreeStream() << config->GetViscosity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetViscosity_FreeStreamND();
1335 Unit.str("");
1336 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "W/m^2.K";
1337 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf/ft.s.R";
1338 NonDimTable << "Conductivity" << "-" << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_Ref() << Unit.str() << "-";
1339 Unit.str("");
1340 if (turbulent) {
1341 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "m^2/s^2";
1342 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "ft^2/s^2";
1343 NonDimTable << "Turb. Kin. Energy" << config->GetTke_FreeStream() << config->GetTke_FreeStream()/config->GetTke_FreeStreamND() << Unit.str() << config->GetTke_FreeStreamND();
1344 Unit.str("");
1345 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "1/s";
1346 else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "1/s";
1347 NonDimTable << "Spec. Dissipation" << config->GetOmega_FreeStream() << config->GetOmega_FreeStream()/config->GetOmega_FreeStreamND() << Unit.str() << config->GetOmega_FreeStreamND();
1348 Unit.str("");
1349 }
1350 }
1351
1352 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1353 NonDimTable << "Mach Number" << "-" << "-" << "-" << config->GetMach();
1354 if (viscous) {
1355 NonDimTable << "Reynolds Number" << "-" << "-" << "-" << config->GetReynolds();
1356 }
1357 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1358 ModelTable.PrintFooter();
1359
1360 if (unsteady){
1361 NonDimTableOut << "-- Unsteady conditions" << endl;
1362 NonDimTable.PrintHeader();
1363 NonDimTable << "Total Time" << config->GetMax_Time() << config->GetTime_Ref() << "s" << config->GetMax_Time()/config->GetTime_Ref();
1364 Unit.str("");
1365 NonDimTable << "Time Step" << config->GetTime_Step() << config->GetTime_Ref() << "s" << config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
1366 Unit.str("");
1367 NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1368 }
1369
1370 cout << ModelTableOut.str();
1371 cout << NonDimTableOut.str();
1372
1373 }
1374}
1375
1376void CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::DetermineGraphDOFs(const CMeshFEM *FEMGeometry,
1377 CConfig *config) {
1378
1379 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1380 /* Step 1: Determine the number of owned DOFs per rank in cumulative */
1381 /* storage format. */
1382 /*********************************************************************/
1383
1384 /*--- Gather the number of DOFs from all ranks. */
1385 nDOFsPerRank.resize(size+1);
1386 nDOFsPerRank[0] = 0;
1387
1388#ifdef HAVE_MPI
1389 SU2_MPI::Allgather(&nDOFsLocOwned, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, &nDOFsPerRank[1], 1,
1390 MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
1391#else
1392 nDOFsPerRank[1] = nDOFsLocOwned;
1393#endif
1394
1395 /*--- Put nDOFsPerRank in cumulative storage format. ---*/
1396 for(int i=0; i<size; ++i)
1397 nDOFsPerRank[i+1] += nDOFsPerRank[i];
1398
1399 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1400 /* Step 2: Determine the global numbering of the DOFs, especially */
1401 /* of the externals. */
1402 /*********************************************************************/
1403
1404 /* Determine the global values of the locally owned DOFs. */
1405 vector<unsigned long> DOFsGlobalID(nDOFsLocTot);
1406 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i)
1407 DOFsGlobalID[i] = nDOFsPerRank[rank] + i;
1408
1409 /*--- Get the communication information from DG_Geometry. Note that for a
1410 FEM DG discretization the communication entities of FEMGeometry contain
1411 the volume elements. ---*/
1412 const vector<int> &ranksSend = FEMGeometry->GetRanksSend();
1413 const vector<int> &ranksRecv = FEMGeometry->GetRanksRecv();
1414 const vector<vector<unsigned long> > &elementsSend = FEMGeometry->GetEntitiesSend();
1415 const vector<vector<unsigned long> > &elementsRecv = FEMGeometry->GetEntitiesRecv();
1416
1417#ifdef HAVE_MPI
1418
1419 /* Parallel implementation. Allocate the memory for the send buffers and
1420 loop over the number of ranks to which I have to send data. Note that
1421 self communication is not excluded here. */
1422 vector<vector<unsigned long> > sendBuf;
1423 sendBuf.resize(ranksSend.size());
1424
1425 vector<SU2_MPI::Request> sendReqs(ranksSend.size());
1426
1427 for(unsigned i=0; i<ranksSend.size(); ++i) {
1428
1429 /* Fill the send buffer for this rank. */
1430 for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsSend[i].size(); ++j) {
1431 const unsigned long jj = elementsSend[i][j];
1432 for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[jj].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1433 const unsigned long kk = volElem[jj].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1434 sendBuf[i].push_back(DOFsGlobalID[kk]);
1435 }
1436 }
1437
1438 /* Send the data using non-blocking sends to avoid deadlock. */
1439 int dest = ranksSend[i];
1440 SU2_MPI::Isend(sendBuf[i].data(), sendBuf[i].size(), MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1441 dest, dest, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &sendReqs[i]);
1442 }
1443
1444 /* Create a map of the receive rank to the index in ranksRecv. */
1445 map<int,int> rankToIndRecvBuf;
1446 for(int i=0; i<(int) ranksRecv.size(); ++i)
1447 rankToIndRecvBuf[ranksRecv[i]] = i;
1448
1449 /* Loop over the number of ranks from which I receive data. */
1450 for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksRecv.size(); ++i) {
1451
1452 /* Block until a message arrives and determine the source and size
1453 of the message. */
1454 SU2_MPI::Status status;
1455 SU2_MPI::Probe(MPI_ANY_SOURCE, rank, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1456 int source = status.MPI_SOURCE;
1457
1458 int sizeMess;
1459 SU2_MPI::Get_count(&status, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, &sizeMess);
1460
1461 /* Allocate the memory for the receive buffer, receive the message
1462 and determine the actual index of this rank in ranksRecv. */
1463 vector<unsigned long> recvBuf(sizeMess);
1464 SU2_MPI::Recv(recvBuf.data(), sizeMess, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1465 source, rank, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1466
1467 map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankToIndRecvBuf.find(source);
1468 source = MI->second;
1469
1470 /* Loop over the receive elements and copy the data for its DOFs in
1471 DOFsGlobalID. */
1472 unsigned long ii = 0;
1473 for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsRecv[source].size(); ++j) {
1474 const unsigned long jj = elementsRecv[source][j];
1475 for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[jj].nDOFsSol; ++k, ++ii) {
1476 const unsigned long kk = volElem[jj].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1477 DOFsGlobalID[kk] = recvBuf[ii];
1478 }
1479 }
1480 }
1481
1482 /* Complete the non-blocking sends. */
1483 SU2_MPI::Waitall(ranksSend.size(), sendReqs.data(), MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE);
1484
1485 /* Wild cards have been used in the communication,
1486 so synchronize the ranks to avoid problems. */
1487 SU2_MPI::Barrier(SU2_MPI::GetComm());
1488
1489#else
1490
1491 /*--- Sequential implementation. Halo's may be present due to periodic
1492 boundary conditions. A loop over the receiving ranks is carried out
1493 to cover both situations, i.e. halo's present and halo's not present. ---*/
1494 for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksRecv.size(); ++i) {
1495 for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsRecv[i].size(); ++j) {
1496 const unsigned long elemR = elementsRecv[i][j];
1497 const unsigned long elemS = elementsSend[i][j];
1498
1499 for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[elemR].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1500 const unsigned long kR = volElem[elemR].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1501 const unsigned long kS = volElem[elemS].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1502
1503 DOFsGlobalID[kR] = DOFsGlobalID[kS];
1504 }
1505 }
1506 }
1507
1508#endif
1509
1510 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1511 /* Step 3: Determine the entries of the graph for the locally stored */
1512 /* data. Note that this data must also be determined for the */
1513 /* halo DOFs, because the faces between partitions are */
1514 /* stored only once. */
1515 /*********************************************************************/
1516
1517 /* Allocate the memory for the first index of nonZeroEntriesJacobian.
1518 During the construction of this data, also the halo DOFs are needed,
1519 hence it is allocate for all DOFs stored on this rank. */
1520 nonZeroEntriesJacobian.resize(nDOFsLocTot);
1521
1522 /* The residual of the DOFs of a volume element depends on all the
1523 DOFs of that volume element. Set these dependencies. Only needed
1524 for the owned elements. */
1525 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nVolElemOwned; ++i) {
1526 for(unsigned short j=0; j<volElem[i].nDOFsSol; ++j) {
1527 const unsigned long jj = volElem[i].offsetDOFsSolLocal + j;
1528 for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[i].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1529 const unsigned long kk = volElem[i].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1530 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[jj].push_back(DOFsGlobalID[kk]);
1531 }
1532 }
1533 }
1534
1535 /* Loop over the internal matching faces to set the dependencies of the
1536 DOFs w.r.t. the DOFs of the neighbors. It is assumed that the residual
1537 of the DOFs depends on all the DOFs of the neighboring elements. This
1538 is always correct for the Navier-Stokes equations. For the Euler equations
1539 in combination with a lumped mass matrix, this is a conservative
1540 estimate. However, it is also correct when the full mass matrix is used.
1541 Therefore, this assumption is used here. */
1542 const unsigned short nTimeLevels = config->GetnLevels_TimeAccurateLTS();
1543 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem[nTimeLevels]; ++i) {
1544
1545 /* Easier storage of the elements on both sides. */
1546 const unsigned long elem0 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID0;
1547 const unsigned long elem1 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID1;
1548
1549 /* Double loop over the DOFs of both elements and set the dependencies
1550 accordingly. */
1551 for(unsigned short j=0; j<volElem[elem0].nDOFsSol; ++j) {
1552 const unsigned long jj = volElem[elem0].offsetDOFsSolLocal + j;
1553 for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[elem1].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1554 const unsigned long kk = volElem[elem1].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1555
1556 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[jj].push_back(DOFsGlobalID[kk]);
1557 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].push_back(DOFsGlobalID[jj]);
1558 }
1559 }
1560 }
1561
1562 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1563 /* Step 4: Carry out the communication for the halo DOFs, such that */
1564 /* all the graph information is obtained for the owned DOFs. */
1565 /*********************************************************************/
1566
1567#ifdef HAVE_MPI
1568
1569 /* Parallel implementation. Allocate the memory for the inverse send buffers
1570 and loop over the number of ranks to which I have to send data for the
1571 inverse communication pattern. Note that self communication is not
1572 excluded here, because efficiency is not really important for this function. */
1573 vector<vector<unsigned long> > invSendBuf;
1574 invSendBuf.resize(ranksRecv.size());
1575
1576 vector<SU2_MPI::Request> invSendReqs(ranksRecv.size());
1577
1578 for(unsigned i=0; i<ranksRecv.size(); ++i) {
1579
1580 /* Fill the inverse send buffer for this rank. */
1581 for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsRecv[i].size(); ++j) {
1582 const unsigned long jj = elementsRecv[i][j];
1583 for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[jj].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1584 const unsigned long kk = volElem[jj].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1585 invSendBuf[i].push_back(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].size());
1586 invSendBuf[i].insert(invSendBuf[i].end(),
1587 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].begin(),
1588 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].end());
1589 }
1590 }
1591
1592 /* Send the data using non-blocking sends to avoid deadlock. */
1593 int dest = ranksRecv[i];
1594 SU2_MPI::Isend(invSendBuf[i].data(), invSendBuf[i].size(), MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1595 dest, dest+1, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &invSendReqs[i]);
1596 }
1597
1598 /* Create a map of the inverse receive (i.e. the original send) rank
1599 to the index in ranksSend. */
1600 map<int,int> rankToIndSendBuf;
1601 for(int i=0; i<(int) ranksSend.size(); ++i)
1602 rankToIndSendBuf[ranksSend[i]] = i;
1603
1604 /* Loop over the number of ranks from which I receive data
1605 in the inverse communication. */
1606 for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksSend.size(); ++i) {
1607
1608 /* Block until a message arrives and determine the source and size
1609 of the message. */
1610 SU2_MPI::Status status;
1611 SU2_MPI::Probe(MPI_ANY_SOURCE, rank+1, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1612 int source = status.MPI_SOURCE;
1613
1614 int sizeMess;
1615 SU2_MPI::Get_count(&status, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, &sizeMess);
1616
1617 /* Allocate the memory for the receive buffer, receive the message
1618 and determine the actual index of this rank in ranksSend. */
1619 vector<unsigned long> recvBuf(sizeMess);
1620 SU2_MPI::Recv(recvBuf.data(), sizeMess, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1621 source, rank+1, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1622
1623 map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankToIndSendBuf.find(source);
1624 source = MI->second;
1625
1626 /* Loop over the elements for which the data was just received. */
1627 int ii = 0;
1628 for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsSend[source].size(); ++j) {
1629 const unsigned long jj = elementsSend[source][j];
1630
1631 for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[jj].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1632 const unsigned long kk = volElem[jj].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1633 const unsigned long nEntries = recvBuf[ii++];
1634
1635 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].insert(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].end(),
1636 recvBuf.data() + ii,
1637 recvBuf.data() + ii + nEntries);
1638 ii += nEntries;
1639 }
1640 }
1641 }
1642
1643 /* Complete the non-blocking sends. */
1644 SU2_MPI::Waitall(ranksRecv.size(), invSendReqs.data(), MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE);
1645
1646 /* Wild cards have been used in the communication,
1647 so synchronize the ranks to avoid problems. */
1648 SU2_MPI::Barrier(SU2_MPI::GetComm());
1649
1650#else
1651 /*--- Sequential implementation. Just add the data of the halo DOFs
1652 to the corresponding owned DOFs. Note that only when periodic
1653 boundary conditions are present, something will happen. ---*/
1654 for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksSend.size(); ++i) {
1655 for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsSend[i].size(); ++j) {
1656 const unsigned long elemR = elementsRecv[i][j];
1657 const unsigned long elemS = elementsSend[i][j];
1658
1659 for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[elemR].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1660 const unsigned long kR = volElem[elemR].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1661 const unsigned long kS = volElem[elemS].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1662
1663 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kS].insert(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kS].end(),
1664 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kR].begin(),
1665 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kR].end());
1666 }
1667 }
1668 }
1669
1670#endif
1671
1672 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1673 /* Step 5: Sort the entries of nonZeroEntriesJacobian in increasing */
1674 /* order and remove possible double entries (caused by */
1675 /* periodic boundaries under certain circumstances). Delete */
1676 /* the memory of the halo data, because it is not needed */
1677 /* anymore. */
1678 /*********************************************************************/
1679
1680 /* Loop over the locally owned DOFs and remove the possible double
1681 entries. This is accomplished by first sorting the data followed
1682 by the removal of duplicate entries using the unique function. */
1683 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i) {
1684 sort(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].begin(), nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].end());
1685 vector<unsigned long>::iterator lastEntry;
1686 lastEntry = unique(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].begin(), nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].end());
1687 nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].erase(lastEntry, nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].end());
1688 }
1689
1690 /* Delete the memory of the halo data. To make sure that the memory
1691 is physically deleted, use the swap function. */
1692 for(unsigned long i=nDOFsLocOwned; i<nDOFsLocTot; ++i)
1693 vector<unsigned long>().swap(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i]);
1694}
1695
1696void CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::MetaDataJacobianComputation(const CMeshFEM *FEMGeometry,
1697 const vector<int> &colorLocalDOFs) {
1698
1699 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1700 /*--- Part 1: Convert the coloring information of the DOFs to the ---*/
1701 /*--- reverse information, namely the DOFs for each color. ---*/
1702 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1703
1704 /* Determine the locally owned DOFs for each color. */
1705 localDOFsPerColor.resize(nGlobalColors);
1706
1707 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i)
1708 localDOFsPerColor[colorLocalDOFs[i]].push_back(i);
1709
1710 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1711 /*--- Part 2: Create the mapping from the global matrix index to the ---*/
1712 /*--- color. In parallel this is a bit more work than one might ---*/
1713 /*--- think, because the parallel data structures do not store ---*/
1714 /*--- all the matrix entities of the local DOFs. Hence, this ---*/
1715 /*--- must be reconstructed via communication. ---*/
1716 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1717
1718 /* Get the send and receive ranks for FEMGeometry. */
1719 const vector<int> &ranksSend = FEMGeometry->GetRanksSend();
1720 const vector<int> &ranksRecv = FEMGeometry->GetRanksRecv();
1721
1722 /* Store the ranks this rank communicates with in a map. These are both
1723 sending and receiving ranks. Make sure to exclude my own rank. */
1724 map<int,int> rankCommToInd;
1725 for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksSend.size(); ++i) {
1726 if(ranksSend[i] != rank) {
1727 const int ind = (int)rankCommToInd.size();
1728 rankCommToInd[ranksSend[i]] = ind;
1729 }
1730 }
1731
1732 for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksRecv.size(); ++i) {
1733 map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankCommToInd.find(ranksRecv[i]);
1734 if((MI == rankCommToInd.end()) &&(ranksRecv[i] != rank)) {
1735 const int ind = (int)rankCommToInd.size();
1736 rankCommToInd[ranksRecv[i]] = ind;
1737 }
1738 }
1739
1740 /* Allocate the memory for the first index of the send buffers. */
1741 vector<vector<unsigned long> > sendBuf(rankCommToInd.size(), vector<unsigned long>(0));
1742
1743 /* Define the map from the global matrix index to the color and the set to
1744 keep track whether an index has already been treated. */
1745 map<unsigned long, int> mapMatrixIndToColor;
1746 set<unsigned long> setTreatedIndices;
1747
1748 /* Loop over the owned DOFs and its matrix entries to create the contents of
1749 either mapMatrixIndToColor (owned DOFs) or sendBuf (unowned DOFs). */
1750 for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i) {
1751 for(unsigned long j=0; j<nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].size(); ++j) {
1752 const unsigned long jj = nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i][j];
1753
1754 /* Check if jj has not been stored yet. */
1755 pair<set<unsigned long>::iterator,bool> attempt = setTreatedIndices.insert(jj);
1756 if( attempt.second ) {
1757
1758 /* Determine the rank where this DOF is stored. */
1759 vector<unsigned long>::iterator low;
1760 low = lower_bound(nDOFsPerRank.begin(), nDOFsPerRank.end(), jj);
1761 int rankDOF = (int)(low - nDOFsPerRank.begin());
1762 if(*low > jj) --rankDOF;
1763
1764 /* If rankDOF is the current rank, create the entry in
1765 mapMatrixIndToColor. Otherwise store jj in the appropriate send
1766 buffer. */
1767 if(rankDOF == rank) {
1768 mapMatrixIndToColor[jj] = colorLocalDOFs[jj-nDOFsPerRank[rank]];
1769 }
1770 else {
1771 map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankCommToInd.find(rankDOF);
1772 sendBuf[MI->second].push_back(jj);
1773 }
1774 }
1775 }
1776 }
1777
1778#ifdef HAVE_MPI
1779
1780 /*--- Loop over the ranks to which this rank has to send data.
1781 Use non-blocking sends to avoid deadlock. ---*/
1782 vector<SU2_MPI::Request> sendReqs(rankCommToInd.size());
1783
1784 map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankCommToInd.begin();
1785 for(unsigned long i=0; i<rankCommToInd.size(); ++i, ++MI) {
1786 const int dest = MI->first;
1787 const int ind = MI->second;
1788
1789 SU2_MPI::Isend(sendBuf[ind].data(), sendBuf[ind].size(), MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1790 dest, dest+2, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &sendReqs[i]);
1791 }
1792
1793 /* Loop over the ranks from which I receive data to be processed. The number
1794 of ranks is equal to the number of ranks to which I just sent data. */
1795 vector<SU2_MPI::Request> sendReturnReqs(rankCommToInd.size());
1796 vector<vector<int> > sendReturnBuf(rankCommToInd.size(), vector<int>(0));
1797 for(unsigned long i=0; i<rankCommToInd.size(); ++i) {
1798
1799 /* Block until a message arrives and determine the source and size
1800 of the message. */
1801 SU2_MPI::Status status;
1802 SU2_MPI::Probe(MPI_ANY_SOURCE, rank+2, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1803 int source = status.MPI_SOURCE;
1804
1805 int sizeMess;
1806 SU2_MPI::Get_count(&status, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, &sizeMess);
1807
1808 /* Allocate the memory for the receive buffer as well as for the
1809 return send buffer. Receive the message afterwards. */
1810 vector<unsigned long> recvBuf(sizeMess);
1811 sendReturnBuf[i].resize(sizeMess);
1812
1813 SU2_MPI::Recv(recvBuf.data(), sizeMess, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1814 source, rank+2, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1815
1816 /* Loop over the data just received and fill the return send buffer
1817 with the color of the DOFs. */
1818 for(int j=0; j<sizeMess; ++j) {
1819 const unsigned long jj = recvBuf[j] - nDOFsPerRank[rank];
1820 if(jj >= nDOFsLocOwned) {
1821 SU2_MPI::Error("This DOF should be owned, but it is not. This should not happen.",CURRENT_FUNCTION);
1822 }
1823 sendReturnBuf[i][j] = colorLocalDOFs[jj];
1824 }
1825
1826 /* Send the return buffer back to the calling rank. Again use non-blocking
1827 sends to avoid deadlock. */
1828 SU2_MPI::Isend(sendReturnBuf[i].data(), sendReturnBuf[i].size(), MPI_INT,
1829 source, source+3, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &sendReturnReqs[i]);
1830 }
1831
1832 /* Complete the first round of non-blocking sends. */
1833 SU2_MPI::Waitall(sendReqs.size(), sendReqs.data(), MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE);
1834
1835 /* Loop over the ranks from which I receive the return information. */
1836 for(unsigned long i=0; i<rankCommToInd.size(); ++i) {
1837
1838 /* Block until a message arrives and determine the source of the message
1839 and its index in the original send buffers. */
1840 SU2_MPI::Status status;
